EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2017.Tuesday Highlights 12-5-17
EmailTemplate.subject: Hear from Microsoft, Scotiabank, Leading Edge Forum, Liberty Mutual and more!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/speakers]]> Book Signings
Meet Pivotal's authors and pick up a free book from 1pm-2pm at the Pivotal booth on L2.
Google Cloud
Visit the Google Cloud booth on Level 2. Thanks to Google Cloud for being a Titanium Sponsor!
Food Extravaganza
Breakfast begins at 7:30am and lunch starts at 12:40pm. Stop by Level 2 and fill up your belly.
Hub Night Out Sign up to join our sponsors for a night on the town. Space is limited!
Any questions? Email us at platform@pivotal.io <[[mailto:platform@pivotal.io]]>.
SpringOne Platform on social: #springone <[[http://info.pivotal.io/n0IY0pk02lAN0JU05x00Cgo]]>, @s1p <[[http://info.pivotal.io/qxJI0C05Nm0Aog02U0Yr00l]]>
Thank you, The SpringOne Platform Team
